puppy.name: Cinnamon
puppy.description: Cinamon is full of energy, his favorite snack are biscuits, he will bring you happiness and lots of funny moments.

puppy.name: Luky
puppy.description: Luky is such a terrific dog! he has a brave spirit, and is always looking for a new adventure exploring the garden. You will never have a boring moment with him.

puppy.name: Cha Cha
puppy.description: Cha Cha is a sweet litte girl who is shy aroud new people but will actively seek interaction when approached in a calm and getle way. She is quite happy to play with other dogs but her favourite thing in life is her tennis ball.

puppy.name: Bubba
puppy.description: Bubba is a sweet two-year-old who is full of fun when he gets to know you, he loves nothing more than a snuggle and some play time. He will definitely love a family that is willing to take things slowly with him and help him adjust to new environments.
